noop.description: Update all SKY UX component packages

help-inline-import-path.description: Update help inline import paths to help inline library.

i18n-resources-module.description: Regenerate i18n resources modules for libraries.

icons-migration.description: Update icons import paths to icons library and add new peer.

remove-nx-cache.description: Remove `.nx/cache` from git and add `.gitignore` entry.

remove-old-compat-stylesheets.description: Remove backward compatible stylesheets for older versions of SKY UX.

workspace-check.description: Log warnings if the workspace is not configured correctly.
